file_content.text: Die, you wretched dog!
I remember you. You shot Braden back on Hutta.
Wha--what the hell are you doing here? Doesn't matter. You saved us the trouble of hunting you down.
Stand down, Sedyn! A matter of honor has brought all of you here today, and it shall be settled as such.
Commander? What's going on?
You owe this hunter a debt of blood, Sedyn, and I would like to see at least one of my pupils redeemed before I die.
If you had played straight, you'd still be waking up tomorrow.
You crossed the wrong hunter.
I guess these weren't your star pupils.
You trained these rejects?
Once, perhaps. Now they are cowards, who embrace deceit and treachery.
Tarro followed your codes, Commander. He stood tall in the last Great Hunt and the others pulled him down like a pack of wild beasts.
He learned from that, and this time he will take us to the top.
Tarro does this for his wounded pride alone. Why can't you see that?
He made his bed, Soongh. Let him lie in it.
It's too late for that.
Yes, perhaps I am wasting my breath. We shall let actions speak now.
Some people were born to ride coat tails. Tarro's their shortcut to fame.
They choose not to.
I believe you are correct, hunter.
You two can kiss and make up on your own time.
I didn't come here for talk.
Insolent dog! No one speaks to us like that!
Save your fury for the arena. I believe you will need it.
He doesn't have blood enough to make up for Braden and Jory.
Some debts can't be repaid.
At least he'll be made to account for his actions.
A Taung blood duel will resolve this dispute. A duel to the death. Challenge Sedyn. A true Mandalorian must accept.
Consider yourself challenged, Sedyn.
Let's do this.
Sounds good to me. Bring it on, Sedyn.
You're going down.
I accept. Rellu, you'll fight as my second. You've dug your own graves.
I accept. You'll wish you'd never joined the Hunt before this is done, dog.
Then I'd only get to kill one of them. I'd hate to miss out.
No, they all die.
You betrayed us for this animal, Commander? It's you who's no longer a true Mandalorian!
You pack... of cowards....
